document_data.name: Yaqubi
document_data.mainbody: The '''Yaqubi''' were a group of people inhabiting the [[Khopet-Dag]] mountains in the [[Endless Wastes]].
document_data.Activities: The Yaqubi earned a living by harvesting silk from the [[giant spider]]s inhabiting the mountains. Each man and woman had their own, jealously guarded gathering spot, hidden from everyone else.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||10}}
